name: Hot Dog (The Pandemy) - Demo 1.0
description:
You are the only survivor of a failed experiment in the experimental hospital that resulted in a pandemic that infected all citizens, now they only eat hot dogs and until they finish with the last one, they will not satisfy their appetite.

Controls: - W = Forward

- S = Back

- Mouse address = Character direction

- Left mouse button = shoot hot dog

- Right mouse button = shoot mustard (granade)(1 each 10 sec)

- PD: you can buy 50 life points (HP) with $ 50 at the pharmacy
